scripts.init-types: poetry run dipdup -c dipdup.local.yml -c dipdup.contracts.yml -c dipdup.yml init -f
scripts.start: poetry run dipdup -c dipdup.local.yml -c dipdup.contracts.yml -c dipdup.yml run
scripts.wipe: poetry run dipdup -c dipdup.local.yml -c dipdup.contracts.yml -c dipdup.yml schema wipe --force
